title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Get ready to elevate your yoga practice with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat in a beautiful teal color. This mat is designed with extra thickness for added comfort and support, making it perfect for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. The soft cushioning of the NBR foam material will help you stay comfortable and focused during your workout.

But that's not all - this mat comes with an easy-cinch yoga mat carrier strap, so you can easily take it with you wherever you go. With dimensions of 72"L x 24"W x 2/5" thick and weighing only 3.11 pounds, this mat is lightweight and portable for on-the-go fitness enthusiasts.

Don't settle for a basic mat - choose the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat for a premium yoga experience. Elevate your practice and enhance your workouts with this high-quality, stylish mat.
